amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, an additional $50,000,000 for Operation and Maintenance for Cooperative Threat Reduction.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1492 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1492 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S8774-8778, S8788-8789; text: CR S8774) To make available, with an offset, an additional $50,000,000 for Operation and Maintenance for Cooperative Threat Reduction.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1492 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Levin.
